name: Flash Light OS
short_description: Flash light OS is a linux based (openSUSE) operating system in early stage designed for gamers. It is in VERY early stages (0.0.1) and currently comes with Wine and Playonlinux, and some other non gaming related stuff. I am hoping to add more software eventually. I will be constantly updating until I get to version 1.0. Then monthly releases. After version 15, I will discontinue the project, I wont bring the download link down. I am not a huge linux nerd yet. So if there is anything essential I missed, please tell me. Also, I am not currently sure if people are capable of installing it yet. It is in early pre-alpha, so give me some feedback. Before you say it absolutely sucks. I am a geek, just new to Linux. Once I find out how stuff works in making a linux distro, I will attempt to make this a good OS overall. (Note: I may discontinue before version 15, version 15 is just my plan. The default user is called User, and his password is password.
summary: Linux distro based off of opensuse
